column2: Uh-oh! Looks like Krita isn't installed! You need to download it from the App Center if you'd like to learn how to use it. Click the icon named App Center on the Desktop, then search for Krita, and install it.

Krita's an art program for people of any skill level - it's got all the tools for amazing visuals.

We've got some useful tutorials linked in here for you, give them a try!

I'll launch Krita - but you can always find it on the Desktop and launch it yourself.
Click the links for these tutorials to open them in your browser and follow along.
The best way to use these videos is to resize your windows so you can can see both Krita and the video.
That way, you can watch the video and follow along at the same time.
This is a good beginner tutorial to start with - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB6ig9dM4Uw
This one's about sketching in Krita - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4nEA7-wtQxo
Here's a tutorial specifically about pixel art, for retro games - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OmnpKQITm3I
Have fun! Remember, you can always restart this activity if you need to see the tips.
Try out some tutorials for Krita, a powerful, free digital painting program.
